Name: Relief of Tep-em-Ankh
Description: Scenes of daily life on tomb walls recalled the life of the deceased in this world. This part of the low-relief of Tep-em-Ankh is an example. A nude man is grasped round the legs by a large monkey. He is trying to keep the monkey away with his left arm. A second man is behind them. He is wearing a short kilt and holding a whip with one hand. In his other hand he leads a female monkey who is carrying a baby. There are still traces of color.
